CUSTOMER CONNECT SEPTEMBER 2019
Dear Honeywell Customer, This month I have a lot of news and updates to share. I would like to highlight the Honeywell Conference in Lindon, Utah on October 16th for Eagle 407HP Operators and main topics of discussion.
I am always available, so don’t hesitate to contact me for assistance. -- Deta Did You Know?
An Invitation to Lindon, Utah for Eagle 407HP Operators Honeywell will be holding an HTS900 Operator’s Conference on October 16, 2019 in Lindon, Utah. This conference will bring together the HTS900 engine operators with the Honeywell Product Support Team for technical discussions and collaboration. Also, participating will be our partners: Eagle Copters and Intermountain Turbine Services. If you are an Eagle 407HP operator and would like to attend, please register here. <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HOC_Lindon_Utah.html]]> Former Mechanic Still Focused on Customer Fixes Honeywell Field Service Engineer Efrain Villafane knows aircraft engines from the inside out. He spent a big part of his 20-year aviation industry career working as a mechanic for legendary aircraft manufacturers Cessna and Bombardier. He doesn’t turn wrenches much anymore. But Efrain is still “Mr. Fixit” when it comes to business aircraft operators with engine problems. Read more. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/september/former-mechanic-still-focused-on-customer-fixes]]>
Technical Support Video of the Month In this months’ Technical Support Video segment, we’re featuring the most watched video on the HTS900. Our HTS900 helicopter engine has been chosen by Eagle Copters for retrofit into the 407HP helicopter which will significantly improve the helicopters hot / high performance. Learn more:
HTS900 <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OUallOEF4kU]]>
Visit MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/HQ002000Z0L0bX00qFI00jG]]> to access the Technical Knowledge Center's thousands of articles and videos to help you solve technical issues, parts ordering, your order status and much more.
Your Honeywell Field Support Representatives are 3 Clicks Away In the latest update, Honeywell introduced a convenient and personalized mobile experience to contact your Honeywell Representatives on-the-go. With 3 easy clicks, you can contact your local Field Service Engineer from anywhere in the world. Your dedicated Field Service Engineer will automatically appear as you select “talk to a technical expert” on the app. Download the app and try for yourself! <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/services/aerospace-services/direct-access]]>
Getting Around the Pilot Gateway Just Got Easier The Honeywell Pilot Gateway has been going through some big changes. While users still have the most up-to-date information on aviation events, news, and technology at their fingertips, now it’s easier than ever to find just what you’re looking for! Read about some of the new features here. Read more. <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/Y0GwA0uZK00sr002qIQ0tXG]]> If you need additional customer support, I am your point of contact.
